reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater trendy and well-made, appreciating its comfort as it's not itchy or stiff, and its soft texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described
items.body: Cute and comfortable. Great quality and fit. Read more
items.author: Bridgette McClain

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely beautiful!
items.body: Wearing this sweater today and I really like it! The colors go perfectly together and look even better in person! The fabric feels soft and very comfortable. The fit is just right. Not too tight, not too loose. It’s definitely a great piece for casual days. Read more
items.author: Janna Soto

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice, and Fairly Thick
items.body: Wearing this sweater for the first time today. Colors are awesome. I should have ordered a small, but feel it may shrink when it's washed and dried, so I'm keeping it. It seems it is true to size. I'm 5"7' and 110 pounds, if that helps. Very nice fabric. The neck is a little funky. More like a boat neck than a crew neck. Maybe my dryer will take care of that. I'm not disappointed at all. Read more
items.author: Robin Elliot

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Autumn!
items.body: This sweater is even better than I expected! It is so cozy, has beautiful stitching, and the color-blocking transitions well. The sweater is very stylish for the Autumn weather. Laundry instructions recommend no tumble dry, but I did so abd had no issues with it. I am 5'3" at 160lbs and I ordered a large. It is flowy enough that it is a perfect fit. Read more
items.author: R. and L. McCarl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok! Size up for a looser fit.
items.body: Sweater is cute, material is think and nice. I wish I would have ordered a bigger size. Amazon recommended a Medium, went with that and a large would have been better for more of an oversized look. A medium is pretty fitted and not the look I was going for. Read more
items.author: AngLnCincy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality sweater !!
items.body: This sweater is top quality and so soft !! I love it. It fits true to size and the colors are vibrant. Read more
items.author: Tammy Rochester

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice!
items.body: Beautiful sweater and fits nicely. Great to wear with jeans or as workwear. Read more
items.author: Watcher0fW0rlds

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not waste your money
items.body: I have only worn this sweater a few times and I wash it delicately. I put it on today because it's getting cold. I noticed a couple snags in the front of the sweater especially the one big one, which I thought was weird because I haven't even taken this out since last season. I don't have anyone that wears or washes my clothes so I don't know what happened to this sweater, but it is unwearable except around the house and it's way to expensive for that. The sweater WAS cute, thick, and warm, but clearly doesn't last. I really liked this sweater so I was very disappointed. Don't waste your money. Read more
items.author: Kristi1032

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: D Brown, A3 Pink, B Red, A2 Black, B1 Green, B1 Pink, D Green, D Off-white, D1 Yellow, A1 White, A4 Brown, B Black, A3 Grey, D Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
